Output
=====================

Save Raw
###########################

Saves Raw data to file

Attributes
------------

+----------------------------------------------------------+
|                          Input                           |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+
| **Name**   | **Type** | **Description**                  |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+
| Raw        | rawEEG   | Raw data to save                 |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+

Settings Interface
-------------------

.. image:: ../Images/Nodes/Raw2Epoch.png
    :align: center

Save Epochs
###########################

Saves Epoch data to file

Attributes
------------

+----------------------------------------------------------+
|                          Input                           |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+
| **Name**   | **Type** | **Description**                  |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+
| Epochs     | epoch    | Epoch data to save               |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+

Settings Interface
-------------------

See `Save Raw`_

Save Evoked
###########################

Saves Evoked data to file

Attributes
------------

+----------------------------------------------------------+
|                          Input                           |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+
| **Name**   | **Type** | **Description**                  |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+
| Evoked     | evoked   | Evoked data to save              |
+------------+----------+----------------------------------+

Settings Interface
-------------------

See `Save Raw`_

Save ICA
###########################

Saves ICA solution to file

Attributes
------------

+----------------------------------------------------------+
|                          Input                           |
+--------------+----------+--------------------------------+
| **Name**     | **Type** | **Description**                |
+--------------+----------+--------------------------------+
| ICA Solution | ICA      | ICA solution to save           |
+--------------+----------+--------------------------------+

Settings Interface
-------------------

See `Save Raw`_
